introductionMessageZH: 需要SRS及相关手术相关请选择下方联系方式
咨询手术相关的问题前推荐进行hrt（激素替代治疗）半年，并且保证您已经超过一年想做手术，手术是不可逆的。如果需要中介以及陪护都可以联系我。期待你的联系喵！
introductionMessageEN: It is recommended that you undergo HRT (Hormone Replacement Therapy) for at least six months before consulting about surgery, and that you have firmly -wanted the surgery- for over a year, as it is irreversible. If you need help with an agency or someone to accompany you, feel free to contact me. Looking forward to hearing from you, nya!
introductionMessageOther: 如果需要中文或者英语麻烦选择右上角选择语言，这个语言暂时没有维护。
私は猫です、大好き猫です、とてもとても好きです。
